channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Rational DOORS Next Generation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Rational DOORS Next Generation

item.title: CVE-2017-1127|2024-08-05T13:25:17.150Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 4.0, 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1128|2024-08-05T13:25:17.484Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.
